title: What are the qualities of a good article? - Quora

response.answer_text: A well-written article is something that rightfully serves its purpose. The content should be relevant to the topic and should create an impact on the reader. The sole purpose of content marketing is to create awareness among the readers, and it should be in the most natural manner. There are a couple of things that add uniqueness to an article. Proper formatting: The way something looks does matter. Proper formatting is essential as it is appealing and presentable. It grabs the reader's attention.Outline of the blog: The blog needs to be well structured. This increases the readability and gives better clarity.Proper research: The quality of content the primary selling point. You need to put genuine information in the content and ensure that the flow remains the same throughout.Infographics: Infographics add more data to the blog and the visual representation is more appealing.Uniqueness: The content needs to be original and unique. This helps a blog to stand out and thus create an impact.

The only way the companies were able to do so is by writing interesting yet engaging content for their readers your website visitors. Until and unless an article sounds interesting informative to users, it is not at all going to be valuable anywhere no matter whether you publish it in your blog or anywhere else. In order to write good content, you should only focus on giving information to your readers. Suppose if your article is related to the “Best kitchen Chimneys”, then your main focus would be to highlight effective tips and guides that readers can make use of to by the best kitchen Chimneys from the market. Besides this, you can also highlight the reliable sources where users can buy the best kitchen Chimneys. This was just for giving you a rough idea of how good content places value to readers. If your content is informative enough, people will keep on visiting your website or blog repeatedly whenever they have to buy something or whenever they have to know about anything particular.
